name: RawImage
desc: A widget that displays a [dart:ui.Image] directly.

fields.name: debugImageLabel
fields.desc: A string identifying the source of the image.

fields.name: width
fields.desc: If non-null, require the image to have this width.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: If non-null, require the image to have this height.

fields.name: scale
fields.desc: The linear scale factor for drawing this image at its intended size.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: If non-null, this color is blended with each image pixel using [colorBlendMode].

fields.name: opacity
fields.desc: If non-null, the value from the [Animation] is multiplied with the opacity of each image pixel before painting onto the canvas.

fields.name: filterQuality
fields.desc: Used to set the filterQuality of the image.

fields.name: colorBlendMode
fields.desc: Used to combine [color] with this image.

fields.name: fit
fields.desc: How to inscribe the image into the space allocated during layout.

fields.name: alignment
fields.desc: How to align the image within its bounds.

fields.name: repeat
fields.desc: How to paint any portions of the layout bounds not covered by the image.

fields.name: centerSlice
fields.desc: The center slice for a nine-patch image.

fields.name: matchTextDirection
fields.desc: Whether to paint the image in the direction of the [TextDirection].

fields.name: invertColors
fields.desc: Whether the colors of the image are inverted when drawn.

fields.name: isAntiAlias
fields.desc: Whether to paint the image with anti-aliasing.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of RawImage
desc: Many properties are the same as Image, see details there.
